have a mind of your own.word: have a mind of your own
have a mind of your own.translation[0].d: to have strong opinions about things, and make your own decisions without being influenced by other people
She’s a woman without fear, with a mind of her own, who says what she thinks.
if an object has a mind of its own, it seems to control itself and does not work or move in the way you want it to
The bicycle seemed to have a mind of its own and I couldn’t steer it straight.
